q: Miami. ET's Nancy O'Dell went on to ask Simon Cowell about the possibility that his friend Paula Abdul will join him on The X Factor. Simon Cowell remained coy with his answer and would only say, We've spoken to a lot of people. I've been speaking to Paula Abdul since she left Idol.
